001package fr.univavignon.pokedex.api;
002
003/**
004 * Pokemon metadata POJO.
005 *
006 * @author fv
007 */
008public class PokemonMetadata {
009
010    /**
011     * Pokemon index.
012     **/
013    private final int index;
014
015    /**
016     * Pokemon name.
017     **/
018    private final String name;
019
020    /**
021     * Pokemon attack level.
022     **/
023    private final int attack;
024
025    /**
026     * Pokemon defense level.
027     **/
028    private final int defense;
029
030    /**
031     * Pokemon stamina level.
032     **/
033    private final int stamina;
034
035    /**
036     * Default constructor.
037     *
038     * @param index   Pokemon index.
039     * @param name    Pokemon name.
040     * @param attack  Attack level.
041     * @param defense Defense level.
042     * @param stamina Stamina level.
043     */
044    public PokemonMetadata(final int index, final String name, final int attack, final int defense, final int stamina) {
045        this.index = index;
046        this.name = name;
047        this.attack = attack;
048        this.defense = defense;
049        this.stamina = stamina;
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * Index getter.
054     **/
055    public int getIndex() {
056        return index;
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * Name getter.
061     **/
062    public String getName() {
063        return name;
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * Attack level getter.
068     **/
069    public int getAttack() {
070        return attack;
071    }
072
073    /**
074     * Defense level getter.
075     **/
076    public int getDefense() {
077        return defense;
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * Stamina level getter.
082     **/
083    public int getStamina() {
084        return stamina;
085    }
086
087}
